name: The Zodiac Project
blurb: A new type of 3D science-fiction MMO for mobile devices where your decisions drive everything from the story to the universal conflict.

rewards.reward: Pledges of this level will receive a bundle of eight high-resolution desktop backgrounds featuring the Zodiac Class Fighter with both federal and confederate markings.  Additionally, all backers will be allowed to submit a name for in-game use.  Planets, moons, factories, ships, historical figures, and everything in-between will need naming, so don't miss an opportunity to become a part of the universe itself!  Furthermore, backers will earn Galactic Equity! All pledges, regardless of their amount, will be granted an equal amount of in-game Equity Points that will allow you to establish the universe BEFORE the servers go live! See the section on Galactic Equity below for more details.

Pledges of this level will be granted the Zodiac Project band ribbon for their achievement display.  This will also mirror the in-game achievement when the game is brought online.  Refer to the section below for more information on Event Horizon's achievement system.

Pledges of this level will receive one black men's universal T-shirt.  This will feature the Zodiac Project logo over the left breast and the image of the campaign's band ribbon above it.  The back will display the Zodiac Fleet's mission patch complete with each colony vessel's crest surrounding it.  You will also receive all rewards below this level.

PATROL or SUPPORT GROUP: Pledges of this level will be given in-game commission certificates for one Patrol Group OR one Support Group.  A Patrol Group consists of one Riegal Class Corvette and one Camorra Class Gunship.  Support Groups are made up of one Spencer Class Freighter and one Bishop Class Hospital Ship.  You will also receive all rewards below this level.  Reference the section below concerning capitol ships for information on these classes.

ATTACK or EXPEDITIONARY GROUP: Pledges of this level will be given in-game commission certificates for one Attack Group OR one Expeditionary Group.  An Attack Group consists of one Corbin Class Destroyer and one Dietzel Class Frigate.  Expeditionary Groups consist of one Hegira Class Colony Vessel loaded with Zodiac Class Fighters and one Magellan Class Science Vessel.  You will also receive all rewards below this level.    Reference the section below concerning capitol ships for information on these classes.

ASSAULT or BATTLE GROUP: Pledges of this level will be given in-game commission certificates for one Assault Group OR one Battle Group.  An Assault Group consists of one Holloway Class Assault Carrier loaded with Barracuda Class Gunboats, one Corbin Class Destroyer, and one Raboldt Class Transit.  Battle Groups consist of one Pratt Class Cruiser, one Corbin Class Destroyer, and one Dietzel Class Frigate.  You will also receive all rewards below this level.  Reference the section below concerning capitol ships for information on these classes.

CARRIER GROUP: Pledges of this level will be given in-game commission certificates for one Battle Group which consists of two Jackson Class Carriers (each loaded with Gemini Class Fighters and Aries Class Bombers), one Pratt Class Cruiser, and one Pegasus Class Transport.  You will also receive all rewards below this level.

CAMPAIGN MEDAL, BRONZE DEVICE:  Pledges of this level will be awarded the gold Zodiac Project Campaign Medal with a bronze fleur-de-lis device.  This will also mirror the in-game achievement when the game goes live next year.  Pledges of this amount will also unlock one Morgan Class Battlecruiser and one Worden Class Recovery Vessel.  You will also receive all rewards below this level.   Reference the section below concerning capitol ships for information on these classes.

CAMPAIGN MEDAL, SILVER DEVICE: Pledges of this level will be awarded the gold Zodiac Project Campaign Medal with a silver fleur-de-lis device. This will also mirror the in-game achievement when the game goes live next year. Pledges of this amount will also unlock one McElroy Class Battleship and one Pegasus Class Transport. Reference the section below concerning capitol ships for information on these classes.  Additionally, pledges of this level will receive a silver patina 1.5" coin featuring the Zodiac Project's mission patch design upon it.  You will also receive all rewards below this level.

CAMPAIGN MEDAL, GOLD DEVICE: Pledges of this level will be awarded the gold Zodiac Project Campaign Medal with a gold fleur-de-lis device. This will also mirror the in-game achievement when the game goes live next year. Pledges of this amount will also unlock one Kuzick Class Dreadnought and one Magellan Class Science Vessel. Reference the section below concerning capitol ships for information on these classes.  Furthermore, all carrier ships will have their small craft loads upgraded to the next-heavier class.  Additionally, pledges of this level will receive an enormous, limited edition, individually numbered, gold-patina 3" coin featuring the Zodiac Project's mission patch design and the words of President Hebert's speech written upon the edge in Latin.  Finally, all pledgers will have their Galactic Equity points doubled for in-game use prior to the BETA launch!  You will also receive all rewards below this level.

EARLY BIRD!  The first 12 backers to pledge to the $500 level will receive all of the normal pledge rewards as well as one unique Hegira Class Colony Vessel.  This will be the virtual in-game representation of one of the original colony vessels launched 16 April 2717 and will carry a compliment of unique Zodiac Class Fighters fitted for deep-space operations.  In addition to all of this, the first 12 backers to reach the $500 level will also receive a unique coin identification.  Instead of a numerical sequence being printed on your coin, these will be engraved with the date "MMDCCXVII" and will have one of the 12 zodiac symbols identifying its sequence.  These will be delivered complete with a hand-signed certificate of authenticity as part of this very special event in the game's history.
